verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Contend,<WH7378> O Lord,<WH3068> with those who contend<WH3401> with me; Fight<WH3898> against<WH854> those who fight<WH3898> against me.
Take<WH2388> hold<WH2388> of buckler<WH4043> and shield,<WH6793> And rise<WH6965> up for my help.<WH5833>
Draw<WH9553> also the spear<WH2595> and the battle-axe to meet<WH7122> those who pursue<WH7291> me; Say<WH559> to my soul,<WH5315> "I am your salvation.<WH3444>"
Let those be ashamed<WH954> and dishonored<WH3637> who seek<WH1245> my life;<WH5315> Let those be turned<WH5472> back<WH268> and humiliated<WH3637> who devise<WH2803> evil<WH9567> against me.
Let them be like chaff<WH4671> before<WH6440> the wind,<WH7307> With the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> driving<WH1760> [them] on.
Let their way<WH1870> be dark<WH2822> and slippery,<WH2519> With the angel<WH4397> of the Lord<WH3068> pursuing<WH7291> them.
For without<WH2600> cause<WH2600> they hid<WH2934> their net<WH7568> for me; Without<WH2600> cause<WH2600> they dug<WH2658> a pit<WH7845> for my soul.<WH5315>

Let destruction<WH9585> come<WH935> upon him unawares<WH3808>;<WH3045> And let the net<WH7568> which<WH834> he hid<WH2934> catch<WH3920> himself; Into that very destruction<WH9585> let him fall.<WH5307>
And my soul<WH5315> shall rejoice<WH1523> in the Lord;<WH3068> It shall exult<WH7797> in His salvation.<WH3444>

All<WH3605> my bones<WH6106> will say,<WH559> "Lord,<WH3068> who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> Thee, Who delivers<WH5337> the afflicted<WH6041> from him who<WH2389> is too<WH4480> strong<WH2389> for him, And the afflicted<WH6041> and the needy<WH34> from him who robs<WH1497> him?"
Malicious<WH2555> witnesses<WH5707> rise<WH6965> up; They ask<WH7592> me of things that I do not know.<WH3045>
They repay<WH9608> me evil<WH9567> for good,<WH9186> [To] the bereavement<WH7908> of my soul.<WH5315>

But as for me, when they were sick,<WH2470> my clothing<WH3830> was sackcloth;<WH8242> I humbled<WH6031> my soul<WH5315> with fasting;<WH6685> And my prayer<WH8605> kept returning<WH7725> to my bosom.<WH2436>
I went<WH1980> about as though it were my friend<WH7453> or brother;<WH251> I bowed<WH7817> down<WH7817> mourning,<WH6937> as one<WH57> who<WH57> sorrows<WH57> for a mother.<WH517>

But at my stumbling<WH6761> they rejoiced,<WH8055> and gathered<WH622> themselves together; The smiters<WH5222> whom I did not know<WH3045> gathered<WH622> together against<WH5921> me, They slandered<WH7167> me without<WH3808> ceasing.<WH1826>
Like godless<WH2611> jesters<WH3934> at a feast,<WH4580> They gnashed<WH2786> at me with their teeth.<WH8127>
Lord,<WH136> how<WH4100> long<WH4100> wilt Thou look<WH7200> on? Rescue<WH7725> my soul<WH5315> from their ravages,<WH7722> My only<WH3173> [life] from the lions.<WH3715>
I will give<WH3034> Thee thanks<WH3034> in the great<WH7227> congregation;<WH6951> I will praise<WH1984> Thee among a mighty<WH6099> throng.<WH5971>
Do not let those who are wrongfully<WH8267> my enemies<WH340> rejoice<WH8055> over me; Neither let those who hate<WH8130> me without<WH2600> cause<WH2600> wink<WH7169> maliciously.<WH7169> <WH5869>
For they do not speak<WH1696> peace,<WH7965> But they devise<WH2803> deceitful<WH4820> words<WH1697> against<WH5921> those who<WH7282> are quiet<WH7282> in the land.<WH776>
And they opened<WH7337> their mouth<WH6310> wide<WH7337> against<WH5921> me; They said,<WH559> "Aha,<WH1889> aha,<WH1889> our eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200> it!"
Thou hast seen<WH7200> it, O Lord,<WH3068> do not keep<WH2790> silent;<WH2790> O Lord,<WH136> do not be far<WH7368> from me.
Stir<WH5782> up Thyself, and awake<WH9516> to my right,<WH4941> And to my cause,<WH7379> my God<WH430> and my Lord.<WH136>
Judge<WH8199> me, O Lord<WH3068> my God,<WH430> according to Thy righteousness;<WH6664> And do not let them rejoice<WH8055> over me.
Do not let them say<WH559> in their heart,<WH3820> "Aha,<WH1889> our desire!<WH5315>" Do not let them say,<WH559> "We have swallowed<WH1104> him up!"

Let those be ashamed<WH954> and humiliated<WH2659> altogether<WH9191> who rejoice<WH8056> at my distress;<WH9567> Let those be clothed<WH3847> with shame<WH1322> and dishonor<WH3639> who magnify<WH1431> themselves over<WH5921> me.

Let them shout<WH7442> for joy<WH7442> and rejoice,<WH8055> who<WH2655> favor<WH2655> my vindication;<WH6664> And let them say<WH559> continually,<WH8548> "The Lord<WH3068> be magnified,<WH1431> Who<WH2655> delights<WH2655> in the prosperity<WH7965> of His servant.<WH5650>"
And my tongue<WH3956> shall declare<WH1897> Thy righteousness<WH6664> [And] Thy praise<WH8416> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.
